snippet: Geetanjali Gupta was articulate in answering questions about the former director of Goldman Sachs and his relationship with Raj Rajaratnam, the fallen hedge fund titan.
abstract: Geetanjali Gupta was articulate in answering questions about the former director of Goldman Sachs and his relationship with Raj Rajaratnam, the fallen hedge fund titan.

headline.main: Gupta's Daughter Testifies at His Insider Trading Trial
